main event: A silver sphere approximately 10 to 15 feet in diameter was observed diving into the water at a 45-degree angle, creating a white spray, and was reported by the crew of a United Airlines flight.
interesting points: The observation lasted for only 15 seconds and included a silver sphere moving at a high speed, possibly 1000 mph., The United Airlines crew verified the sighting., The object stopped suddenly before diving into the water., The sighting was confirmed by multiple crew members, indicating a reliable observation., The description was made as part of a Project Blue Book record card.
